Package ie.gmit.dip

Class WordCloud

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.dip.WordCloud
public class WordCloud
extends Object
The class WordCloud is the main class in the WordCloud program which has dependencies to other secondary implementation classes for WordCloud program.
Since:
1.8
Version:
1.0
Author:
AlexCraciun
See Also:
ArrayListFileReader, WebPageReader, FrequencyTable, ArrayListFileReader

  • Constructor Details

    • WordCloud

      public WordCloud​(String fileNameToParse, int maxNumberOfWords, String imageFileName)
      The constructor of the WordCloud object.
      Parameters:
      fileNameToParse - The file name to parse user input. The user needs to be provide a valid file path. Only .txt files can be parsed.
      maxNumberOfWords - The max. number of words used to include into image file.
      imageFileName - The image file name used to generate image file.

  • Method Details

    • printWordCloudImage

      public void printWordCloudImage​(String imageFileName, int maxNumberOfWords) throws IOException
      Creates and saves a word cloud image with the number of words provided as an input. The location in the file system the image file is created it's in the root directory.
      Parameters:
      imageFileName - The image file name used to generate image file.
      maxNumberOfWords - The max. number of words used to include into image file.
      Throws:
      IOException
